Koble Kernel

Overview

This project is for compiling a User Mode Linux kernel for use with Koble.

Building

To build the kernel run

./pleasew build //:kernel

This will output the kernel to plz-out/bin/linux.

OR to create a kernel tarball:

./pleasew build //:archive

This will create an archive at plz-out/gen/koble-kernel-VERSION.tar.gz containing the linux binary.

If you already have plz installed you can replace ./pleasew with it in these commands.

Usage

The kernel is intended to be used with Koble however can be used for testing without Koble.

For example:

./linux name=test umid=test mem=132M ubd0=test-overlay.disk,/path/to/koble-fs root=98:0 con0=fd:0,fd:1 con1=null hosthome=$HOME
you must have a filesystem built for this, such as koble-fs.
